aboutPreview.title: Why Holistic Family Dentistry & Biocompatible Oral Health?
aboutPreview.subtitle: It can help with

benefits.title: Disease Prevention
benefits.description: Education & early intervention/preventive therapy programs rooted in optimal nutrition, hygiene, oral habits, & supplementation

benefits.title: Sleep & Fatigue
benefits.description: Proper airway development & management with optimal mandibular positioning & TMJ function

benefits.title: Detoxification
benefits.description: Removal of mercury amalgam & other heavy metals. Ozone & charcoal therapy

benefits.title: Chronic Inflammatory Symptoms
benefits.description: Treatment based on root cause of symptoms. Active collaboration amongst your health & wellness providers

benefits.title: Chronic Pain
benefits.description: Orthopedic, orthodontic, & myofunctional approach to treating most common head & neck sources of pain

benefits.title: Biocompatible
benefits.description: Minimize or eliminate overall burden on systemic health via use of biological products

testimonials.content: Absolutely loved everything about my experience here. The staff is so kind, so knowledgeable, and they found a health issue (UARS) that had been overlooked by all the healthcare practitioners I've seen in the past. Can't recommend them enough!
testimonials.author: Taylor S.

testimonials.content: Dr. Ombrello and her team are absolutely wonderful! They take a holistic approach to dentistry that considers your whole health, not just your teeth. The mercury-free treatments and biocompatible materials give me peace of mind.
testimonials.author: Michael R.

testimonials.content: Finally found a dentist who understands the connection between oral health and overall wellness. The staff is incredibly knowledgeable about holistic dentistry and they truly care about their patients' long-term health.
testimonials.author: Sarah L.
